EmailTemplate.name: Temporary Solution Provided Outbound All Channel
EmailTemplate.subject: Temporary Solution Provided: {!Case.CaseNumber}, {!Case.Subject}, {!Case.Reference_Number__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.Contact},
Based on investigation and analysis, I’ve determined the temporary solution for this Case, with the reported issue of: {!Case.Subject}.
The temporary solution for the issue reported is defined as: {!Case.CH_TemporarySolution__c}. If you determine this temporary solution solves the issue reported fully, this may be accepted as a final solution for the issue reported.
As a reminder of this Case, the Case number is {!Case.CaseNumber} for the {!Case.Type} Case, with the Product identified as {!Case.Product} reported to Nokia at {!Case.CH_ReportedDate__c}.
Should you need to follow up on this case, please use this Case Number as reference.
If you would like to view or update your case online, please visit:
<hyperlink><name>Case specific Link to Customer Portal
https://www.nokia.com/en_in/phones/support
If you do not have online access, you may register here:
<hyperlink><name>Link to Customer Portal Registration
https://www.nokia.com/en_in/phones/support
Regards,
{!Case.OwnerFullName}
